The animation was good. That's it.  This was AWFUL. Dont watch it.
If you were forced to watch this as I was, I apologize. Horrible. Of course I would rather watch this train wreck of a show than the captain marvel movie. Where this site is deleting reviews
A perfect deconstruction of post-9/11 consumer youth society- 10/10 would watch again

The Emoji Movie had some great voice acting with great visuals too, sometimes. But the writing is just unbearable. Kids aren't that dumb, though they are still pretty dumb, but not the same I.Q. level of this movie. Think of ADHD, but it's boring.

What is there to say about this movie that hasn't already been said? Patrick Stewart as a poop emoji? An inspired decision by director Tony Leondis. Going into this movie, I couldn't have imagine that he would improve on his previous effort "Lilo & Stitch 2: Stitch Has a Glitch", but this movie was phenomenal! I have seen this movie thrice and it never gets old. I admire Gene breaking the social norms of the emoji society and discovering himself. Obviously this is a critique of beauty standards and the stifling atmosphere created by our hyper obsessed social media culture. I admire Tony Leondis' effort in highlighting this point via emojis and his creative team knocked all of our socks off! I am so impressed and will recommend this to friends, my mother, my father, my professors (RTF profs), my neighbors, and last but not least my pastor!

I literally want to die after seeing this movie please kill me it's fucking terrible.
When the movie starts it's kinda meh it's bad but not extreme cringe. By the just Dance it becomes so cringy I find my self shrieking and vocally cringing in ways you have never seen before  I have thought movies were bad before but this is the first time I have hated a movie and it does not help that the best actor in the cast plays the poop emoji uggghhhhhhgghhhhhh RRRRRRRRRRRRRRERRRREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
